## GestureStreamOpts.preventScrollOnZoom property

If true (default), wheel events on the element will prevent the document from scrolling. If false, the wheel event will use the eventOpts.passive argument (default: true) which should be true in most cases for performance reasons: https://www.chromestatus.com/feature/5745543795965952

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
preventScrollOnZoom: boolean;
```
